metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12479 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A Improper Input Validation vulnerability in Open Build Service allowsremote attackers to cause DoS by specifying crafted request IDs. Affectedreleases are openSUSE Open Build Service: versions prior to01b015ca2a320afc4fae823465d1e72da8bd60df.

criterions.comment: open-build-service: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
